articles.author: Utathya Nag
articles.title: Badminton Asia Team Championships 2024: India women in semi-finals - Olympics
articles.description: The Indian women’s team beat Hong Kong China 3-0 in the Badminton Asia Team Championships 2024 quarter-finals on Friday. Indian men lost and bowed out.
articles.content:
The Indian womens team confirmed a medal at the Badminton Asia Team Championships 2024 after blanking Hong Kong China 3-0 in the quarter-finals in Shah Alam, Malaysia on Friday.
